item.description:
Tri-City ridings rejigged for next federal election - The Tri

item.title: Mentioned by Coquitlam Now
item.description:
Moore bumped up to Minister of Industry
... MOVES FROM HERITAGE AND OFFICIAL LANGUAGES TO INDUSTRY. By Jeremy Deutsch, Coquitlam Now July 17, 2013. Local MP James Moore has gone from supporting Canadian artists and musicians to overseeing the industry that profits off of them.
